name: hash-n

0.1.0.name: hash-n
0.1.0.description: Compute hash of current buffer or selected text. Real-time value displayed in the Atom status bar.

readme:
# hash-n
Compute hash of current buffer or selected text. Real-time value displayed in the Atom status bar.

![hash-n](http://share.rockymadden.com/8sxc+)

## Tidbits
* Clicking the status bar hash value will to copy said value to your clipboard
* Algorithms available are system dependent, but include:  dsa, dsa-sha, dsa-sha1, dsaEncryption,
dsaWithSHA, dsaWithSHA1, dss1, ecdsa-with-SHA1, md4, md4WithRSAEncryption, md5, md5WithRSAEncryption, mdc2, mdc2WithRSA,
ripemd, ripemd160, ripemd160WithRSA, rmd160, rsa-md4, rsa-md5, rsa-mdc2, rsa-ripemd160, rsa-sha, rsa-sha1, rsa-sha1-2,
rsa-sha224, rsa-sha256, rsa-sha384, rsa-sha512, sha, sha1, sha1WithRSAEncryption, sha224, sha224WithRSAEncryption,
sha256, sha256WithRSAEncryption, sha384, sha384WithRSAEncryption, sha512, sha512WithRSAEncryption,
shaWithRSAEncryption, ssl2-md5, ssl3-md5, ssl3-sha1
